name: Pommes Annette
keywords: butter, gold potatoes, side dish, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text:
Heat oven to 400. Peel and thinly slice all-purpose potatoes (consider
using a food processor). Toss with 3 tablespoons melted butter or oil and neatly layer in
a 10- or 12-inch ovenproof skillet. Bake for 30 minutes; slide the cake out onto a
plate, cover with another plate, invert it and slide it back into the skillet, with a little more
butter or oil if necessary. Continue cooking until potatoes are done and top is
browned, 20-25 minutes; cut into wedges.
